questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) An architectural model

A) A natural landscape
B) An architectural model
C) A group of people
D) A piece of artwork

A) A tree
B) A tall building model
C) A person
D) A painting

A) A garden
B) A street
C) A detailed model of a building
D) A dining table

A) Green and brown
B) Blue and beige
C) Red and yellow
D) Black and white

A) Columns and arches
B) Glass windows and domes

A) Gothic
